message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper addresses the issue of continual learning in deep neural networks, which is a topic that falls under the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision (cs.CV), neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE), and natural language processing (cs.CL). However, since the paper focuses on image classification tasks, cs.CV is more likely to be the primary sub-category, followed by cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, and cs.CL.
